Name: Base Station License, Fast Express Car Service, Inc., Bronx
Title: A Local Law in relation to the approval of a determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Fast Express Car Service Inc., submitted as Fast Express Car Service, Inc., for the renewal of a license to operate a base station in the borough of The Bronx.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section one.  The determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Fast Express Car Service Inc., submitted as Fast Express Car Service, Inc., for the renewal of a license to operate a base station at 405 Castle Hill Avenue in the borough of The Bronx is hereby approved. 
      ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect immediately. 

LS#920
